body_html:
Starting with release 1.1, this will be done. I'll close this issue out when I update the documentation (Java README). But in the mean time, note that you can use the release candidate version by adding:

<dependency>
  <groupId>org.tensorflow</groupId>
  <artifactId>tensorflow</artifactId>
  <version>1.1.0-rc0-windows-fix</version>
</dependency>

to your project's pom.xml.

to your project's pom.xml.
body:
Starting with release 1.1, this will be done. I'll close this issue out when I update the documentation (Java README). But in the mean time, note that you can use the release candidate version by adding:

```xml
<dependency>
  <groupId>org.tensorflow</groupId>
  <artifactId>tensorflow</artifactId>
  <version>1.1.0-rc0-windows-fix</version>
</dependency>
```

to your project's `pom.xml`.
